thread.title: Vendor Marketing Manager - Sports Equipment

title: Vendor Marketing Manager - Sports Equipment
text: Make Your Passion Your Career. â„¢ Work In Sports. Region Map Here is the job that interests you: Vendor Marketing Manager   Management of a small team. Creating and analyzing automated campaign performance reports. Develop integrated marketing strategies and tactics for our vendors that offer strong ROI; work in conjunction with Customer Marketing and Merchandising teams   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
